## IRouter.handleLegacyErrors property

Wrap a router handler to catch and converts legacy boom errors to proper custom errors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleLegacyErrors: <P, Q, B>(handler: RequestHandler<P, Q, B>) => RequestHandler<P, Q, B>;
```
